name: postcss-clean
description: PostCSS plugin to minify CSS with clean-css

scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run develop
scripts.preversion: npm run from:master && npm run distrib
scripts.version: npm run changelog && npm run changelog:edit && git add CHANGELOG.md
